birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山西省临猗县
birth_place.en: Linyi County, Shanxi Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国律师，前中共中央政治局委员薄熙来之妻。因犯故意杀人罪被判处死刑，缓期二年执行，后减为无期徒刑，目前在燕城监狱服刑。
description.en: A Chinese lawyer and the wife of former Politburo member Bo Xilai. She was convicted of intentional homicide and received a suspended death sentence, which was later commuted to life imprisonment. She is currently serving her sentence at Yancheng Prison.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，前中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记，谷开来之夫。
description.en: A Chinese politician, former member of the Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and former Party Secretary of Chongqing. He is the husband of Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来与谷开来之子。
description.en: The son of Bo Xilai and Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，一二九运动发动人之一，谷开来之父。
description.en: A major general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, one of the initiators of the December 9th Movement, and the father of Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 抗战时期太行山区的妇救会干部，谷开来之母。
description.en: A women's salvation association cadre in the Taihang Mountains area during the War of Resistance Against Japan, and the mother of Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 英国商人，在海伍德死亡案中被谷开来与张晓军合谋杀害。
description.en: A British businessman who was murdered by Gu Kailai and Zhang Xiaojun in the Death of Neil Heywood case.

description.zh-cn: 薄家勤务人员，谷开来谋杀尼尔·海伍德的同案犯。
description.en: An orderly of the Bo family and an accomplice in Gu Kailai's murder of Neil Heywood.

description.zh-cn: 中国田径教练，曾聘请谷开来担任其代理律师。
description.en: A Chinese athletics coach who once hired Gu Kailai as his legal representative.

description.zh-cn: 《马家军调查》一书的作者，曾被谷开来代表马俊仁起诉。
description.en: The author of the book 'An Investigation into Ma's Army', who was sued by Gu Kailai on behalf of Ma Junren.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的著名高等学府。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 由谷开来创立的律师事务所，后于2001年改名为昂道律师事务所。
description.en: A law firm founded by Gu Kailai, which was renamed Angdao Law Firm in 2001.

description.zh-cn: 由北京开来律师事务所于2001年更名而来。
description.en: Renamed from Beijing Kailai Law Firm in 2001.

nodes.id: 安徽省合肥市中级人民法院

zh-cn: 安徽省合肥市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 审理谷开来故意杀人案的法院。
description.en: The court that tried the Gu Kailai intentional homicide case.

description.zh-cn: 关押谷开来的监狱。
description.en: The prison where Gu Kailai is incarcerated.

description.zh-cn: 中国山西省下辖的一个县，是谷开来的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Shanxi Province, China, and the birthplace of Gu Kailai.

nodes.id: 重庆打黑除恶专项行动

zh-cn: 重庆打黑除恶专项行动

description.zh-cn: 由时任重庆市委书记薄熙来主导的一场大规模打击有组织犯罪的运动。
description.en: A large-scale campaign against organized crime led by then-Chongqing Party Secretary Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 指英国商人尼尔·海伍德被谋杀的案件，主犯为谷开来和张晓军。
description.en: Refers to the murder case of British businessman Neil Heywood, with Gu Kailai and Zhang Xiaojun as the main culprits.

description.zh-cn: 谷开来与薄熙来于1987年结婚。
description.en: Gu Kailai and Bo Xilai married in 1987.

description.zh-cn: 薄瓜瓜是谷开来的儿子。
description.en: Bo Guagua is the son of Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 薄瓜瓜是薄熙来的儿子。
description.en: Bo Guagua is the son of Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 谷开来是谷景生的女儿。
description.en: Gu Kailai is the daughter of Gu Jingsheng.

description.zh-cn: 谷开来是范承秀的女儿。
description.en: Gu Kailai is the daughter of Fan Chengxiu.

degree.zh-cn: 法律系学士、国际政治学硕士
degree.en: Bachelor of Laws, Master of International Politics

description.zh-cn: 1978年考取北京大学法律系，后继续攻读该校国际政治学硕士学位。
description.en: She was admitted to the Law Department of Peking University in 1978 and later pursued a master's degree in International Politics at the same university.

description.zh-cn: 谷开来于20世纪80年代后期在大连成立了开来律师事务所。
description.en: Gu Kailai founded the Kailai Law Firm in Dalian in the late 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 2001年，北京开来律师事务所改名为昂道律师事务所。
description.en: In 2001, Beijing Kailai Law Firm was renamed Angdao Law Firm.

description.zh-cn: 谷开来因谋杀英国商人尼尔·海伍德而被定罪。
description.en: Gu Kailai was convicted of murdering British businessman Neil Heywood.

description.zh-cn: 张晓军作为同案犯，与谷开来合谋杀害了尼尔·海伍德。
description.en: As an accomplice, Zhang Xiaojun conspired with Gu Kailai to murder Neil Heywood.

relationships.source: 安徽省合肥市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 一审以故意杀人罪判处谷开来死刑，缓期二年执行。
description.en: In the first instance, sentenced Gu Kailai to death with a two-year reprieve for intentional homicide.

description.zh-cn: 因故意杀人罪在燕城监狱服刑。
description.en: Serving a sentence at Yancheng Prison for intentional homicide.

description.zh-cn: 谷开来出生于山西省临猗县。
description.en: Gu Kailai was born in Linyi County, Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 聘请谷开来担任其代理律师，起诉作家赵瑜。
description.en: Hired Gu Kailai as his legal representative to sue author Zhao Yu.

description.zh-cn: 曾受聘担任马俊仁的代理律师，起诉《马家军调查》的作者赵瑜。
description.en: Was hired as the legal representative for Ma Junren and sued Zhao Yu, the author of 'An Investigation into Ma's Army'.

relationships.target: 重庆打黑除恶专项行动

description.zh-cn: 据其丈夫薄熙来称，谷开来以其法律知识在“打黑”行动中给予了很大帮助。
description.en: According to her husband Bo Xilai, Gu Kailai provided significant help to the 'Strike Black' campaign with her legal knowledge.
